availability.p: Published under a Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike 3.0 License

div.head: Description of changes for 2011.10
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft created fromm a comparison of the Reims and Vatican manuscripts. Transcriptions of the Sorbonne and St. Victor manuscripts still need to be completed. Corrections and editions will be made after a collation comparision of available manuscript witnesses. A provisional critical apparatus has been made and will need to be corrected and expanded with the Sorbonne and St. Victor transcriptions are complete. Citations and cross-references still need to be added.
